structure.unit: CHAPTER 7. - REMOVAL AND DISPOSITION OF ABANDONED AND NUISANCE MOTOR VEHICLES
Sec. 12-7014. - UNLAWFUL REMOVAL OF IMPOUNDED VEHICLE.

law.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to use for any dog, attack and security dog training facility, or holding facility, a license receipt, or a rabies inoculation certificate issued to another person, dog, cat, or facility. (Code 1959 , ยง4-49; Ord. No. 1980-502, ยง4, 10-21-80; Ord. No. 2012-59, ยง5, 6-5-12, eff. 1-1-13)
